Description: Grey Transparent Flamed ESP LTD M350NT w Case XNice!! serial # L14051355, ESP has designed some great guitars and this is no exception. Ours is sooo clean your friends will think it is new :-) This set neck guitar is well balanced and plays very nice w/ low non buzz action. It features a Rosewood fretboard with fancy inlays and binding, dual EMG humbuckers and a thru body tailpiece . Just wiped it down and installed a new set of D’Adario XL10s. This thing plays so easy and tons of tone as one would expect. Includes a simple hard case in very nice condition to keep it warm and happy. Save a bunch over retail :-). As with all our fine instruments, we understand the bond between player and instrument and always offer a 30 day play/return policy with No restocking fee.
